channel.title: How do I
channel.description: OK, I have a No-IP, the DUC, a server source, the Mopar client, etc. Everything. OK. Now what do I do from here. How do I log into my server? I currently have my No-IP DUC running, and my Moparscape files and Pimpscape source file is in the same file under My Documents. Does it have to be in c:/? And what is the order to getting into my server (type this in New Server, type that in New Port, start server, use runbot in your server source, etc.). Please help. I've been confused for the past two days on this!!!! :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @dunea dunea
item.description:
@dunea wrote:

btw don’t quad post lol aka post 4 times in a row. just edit…

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @Generalscape Generalscape
item.description:
@Generalscape wrote:

OK, so I use my server runbot before I do that, right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 10:36:06 AM[/size][hr]And it’s OK if my files are in My Documents, right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 10:39:06 AM[/size][hr]I’m still confused!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 10:45:55 AM[/size][hr]found out how to do it. Thanks. MODS, PLEASE DELETE THIS TOPIC

Read full topic

item.description:
@Rayne wrote:

or leave it blank for ip.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Run the server, than type “localhost” into the server IP.

For others to login, they have to use the no-ip address.

Read full topic
